# photoswiper

`r usethis::use_lifecycle_badge('experimental')`

The goal of photoswiper is to create a simple api for adding an image gallery to a `shiny` application. [PhotoSwipe](http://photoswipe.com/) is a minimalist javascript gallery with no dependancies, created by [Dimitri Semenov](https://github.com/dimsemenov). 

## Installation

You can install the released version of photoswiper from [github](https://github.com/mrjoh3/photoswiper) with:

``` r
devtools::install_github("mrjoh3/photoswiper")
```
